articles.author: Jon Gambrell
articles.title: Russia blindfolds, detains Ukraine nuclear plant chief - The Associated Press
articles.description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — Russian forces blindfolded and detained the head of Europe’s largest nuclear plant, Ukraine’s nuclear power provider said Saturday, reigniting long-simmering fears over the plant's security.
